svg.style: font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; background-color: white; text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;

text.tspan: Coal production per capita over the long-term
Average coal production per capita over the long-term, measured in megawatt-hour (MWh) equivalents per person
Source: Long-term per capita fossil fuels - OWID based on UN, Gapminder, BP, Etemad & Luciana
